content.raw:
I consistently get a `UNIT_MainWindow_TEST` failure with the following results:

```
********* Start testing of MainWindow_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : MainWindow_TEST::initTestCase()
QWARN  : MainWindow_TEST::SceneDestruction() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::DeleteSignal(const std::string &) to gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::OnDelete(const std::string &)
SharePercentChange[0.687193] ShareMaxPercentChange[2]
ResPercentChange[1.54153]ResMaxPercentChange[5]
PASS   : MainWindow_TEST::SceneDestruction()
QWARN  : MainWindow_TEST::Selection() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::DeleteSignal(const std::string &) to gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::OnDelete(const std::string &)
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::Selection() 'vis != NULL' returned FALSE. ()
   Loc: [/home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc(68)]
QFATAL : MainWindow_TEST::Selection() Received signal 11
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::Selection() Received a fatal error.
   Loc: [Unknown file(0)]
Totals: 2 passed, 2 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of MainWindow_TEST *********
Aborted (core dumped)
```
